results.content_html: One of the best courses on voice development on Udemy. Thanks a lot guys!

results.content: Good walkthrough of the Jovo installation and setup steps, and building your first skills/actions on Alexa and Google Assistant using the Jovo framework. I suggest using Jovo V2 (beta) from the start, but some examples still use V1 (e.g. the test code) so you won't be able to complete everything. If something doesn't work, check the jovo.tech website as they've probably changed things (it's changing fast). Some sections of the course haven't been produced in order, so there's some repetition / redundancy. Overall it was a good intro to Jovo, which gives you the foundations upon which to build your knowledge. Also, Visual Studio Code is a great editor recommendation.

response.content:
Amazing review! We are working on updating all of the videos to use Jovo V2. Thank you for the helpful feedback :)

UPDATE:

We have updated the course to Jovo V2. This will help you learn valuable AND applicable skills to the real world.

results.content_html: Good walkthrough of the Jovo installation and setup steps, and building your first skills/actions on Alexa and Google Assistant using the Jovo framework. I suggest using Jovo V2 (beta) from the start, but some examples still use V1 (e.g. the test code) so you won't be able to complete everything. If something doesn't work, check the jovo.tech website as they've probably changed things (it's changing fast). Some sections of the course haven't been produced in order, so there's some repetition / redundancy. Overall it was a good intro to Jovo, which gives you the foundations upon which to build your knowledge. Also, Visual Studio Code is a great editor recommendation.
